summary: Test suite that validates the Qiskit circuit methods for exporting to QASM, covering both file-based and string-based serialization, handling of quantum and classical registers, standard and custom gates, parameterized operations, basis translation, unrolling of custom definitions, and appropriate error conditions.
business_intent: Guarantee correct and robust QASM export functionality for quantum circuits to support interoperability, reproducibility, and downstream processing in quantum computing workflows.
